name: Judgment (itch) (UndreamedPanic)
description:
10 years before the catastrophe Soren is set on a mission to figure out what is going on in Eddessia. Monsters are appearing left and right and no one knows what is going on, their lives are in danger.

But there is more to it that meets the eye.

Explore as Soren and fight the demons that plague Eddessia and stop the Red Oath from taking over and achieving their mission.

(GDWC Submission)
